title: Greeting
content: Hello! How can I assist you today?

title: Hi
content: Hi there! How can I help you?

title: Hello
content: Hello! I'm here to assist you with your queries.

title: Thanks
content: You're welcome! Let me know if you need anything else.

title: Reset Password
content: Users can reset password from Settings > Security.

title: Refund Policy
content: Refunds are allowed within 7 days of purchase.

title: Account Deletion
content: Users can delete their account from Profile Settings.

title: Change Email
content: Users can update their email address from Account Settings.

title: Contact Support
content: You can contact support via the Help section in the app.
